heading: Today
text: Mostly sunny south of the Adirondacks and I-89.  Variable clouds and sun northeast, more clouds through the mountains.  A few spotty showers or sprinkles possible. Highs in the 40s to near 50 north, 50 to 55 south.  Winds becoming north 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Periods of clouds northeast, an evening sprinkle, decreasing.  Mostly clear west and south, with patches of dense valley fog forming.  Lows from the upper 20s to mid 30s, some mid 20s in the cold spots.  Winds diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Tuesday
text: Pockets of dense valley fog burning off.  Sunshine, mixed with clouds north and east. Highs in the low to mid 50s, near 50 northeast.  Light winds, becoming north up to 10 mph.
